text: Killer Croc (Waylon Jones) is a fictional character seen in comic books by DC Comics. He is mainly a villain in Batman comics. Created by Gerry Conway, Don Newton and Gene Colan, the character was introduced in Batman #357 (March, 1983). The character has an apperance similar to a lizard or a crocodile. He is very strong and a good swimmer. == Fictional character biography == Before he became Killer Croc, Waylon Jones was a wrestler. == In other media == The character was voiced by Aron Kincaid in Batman: The Animated Series. He was played by Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje in the 2016 movie Suicide Squad. ==References== Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics characters Category:Fictional African-American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1983
title: Killer Croc
